nodes.text: Kabray was a Mid Rim forest world orbited by the Kabray Station, a neutral meeting place for diplomats from all over the galaxy.

It was on Kabray Station that Leia Organa impersonated Shirley, the Chanteuse of the Stars, while searching for Tay Vanis. Leia later went to Kabray to reassure representatives of the Alliance of Free Planets that the Alliance would not be merely a new Galactic Empire, but she and the delegates were captured by Nagai. Leia's Zeltron aides helped free Leia and defeat the Nagai.
